column5: I wasn't sure if you guys had seen this before but thought I'd share    Mrs took these shots on her lunch brake a while back... Don't know who the creator is but to me, this... a work of art    if only it could be called graffiti  She said that while going down the stairs... couldn't see a thing   but once at the bottom of the stairs and turned around  Enjoy! TJunkie        Close ups
Nice looking Art Work, Different, thanx for sharing, Maybe Toronto Transit could use these in there stairways.....

That is really cool. I saw an exhibition of these eco-art photos the last time I was in Ottawa. Really big pictures about 8 ft. by 6 ft. They were done on a cement wall in a pedestrian underpass. The stairway idea is brilliant. Still can't figure out how they do it though. It's not painted on. It must be some type of printing process.
